data.prayer: Spirit, teach the 3,492 believers in Tak that when they seek first your Kingdom and your righteousness, you will abundantly provide all they need.
data.verse: And God is able to bless you abundantly, so that in all things at all times, having all that you need, you will abound in every good work.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Tak, Thailand
data.section_summary: What challenges do people here face?

data.prayer: Spirit, teach the children in the state of Tak to pray with passion and pleading for your presence.

data.section_summary: On average, 46 people will die without Jesus in the next 100 hours in Tak, Thailand.
data.prayer: Father, send your gospel to these.
Father, please raise up new apostles to pioneer the growth of the church in Tak.
data.verse: So Christ himself gave the apostles, the prophets, the evangelists, the pastors and teachers, to equip his people for works of service, so that the body of Christ may be built up

data.prayer: Jesus, please find the broken hearted among the 540,100 souls in Tak and mend their wounds.
data.verse: He heals the brokenhearted and binds up their wounds.

data.prayer: Spirit, help the 3,492 believers find a person of peace today among the 536,608 lost neighbors around them. And help them start discovery bible studies in these unbelieving homes.
data.verse: Suddenly a man in shining clothes stood before me and said, ‘Cornelius, God has heard your prayer and remembered your gifts to the poor. Send to Joppa for Simon who is called Peter. He is a guest in the home of Simon the tanner, who lives by the sea.’ So I sent for you immediately, and it was good of you to come. Now we are all here in the presence of God to listen to everything the Lord has commanded you to tell us.”

data.prayer: Pour your Spirit out on the 540,100 citizens of Tak, Thailand, so that they might know your name and the name of your Son.
data.verse: And afterward, I will pour out my Spirit on all people. your sons and daughters will prophesy, your old men will dream dreams, your young men will see visions.

data.prayer: Father, you desire to blot out the sins of the people of Tak, Thailand. You said, if they turn to you, you will dissolve their sins like mist.
data.verse: I have blotted out, as a thick cloud, your transgressions, and, as a cloud, your sins. Return to me, for I have redeemed you.
